name: Transparent Telegram
description: A transparent, borderless and dark Telegram UI. Options: - Custom Background Image (and it's size, position and blurriness) or Color - Transparency Interface Color - Messages Bubbles sizes and Joining - Fullscreen - Colors (Accent, Text) - Font Family - Custom Installed Font Family Try Minimal Transparent Whatsapp theme! Suggest new features and/or detect bugs, thank you!
